channel.title: Help, Client won't log in I get this error
channel.description:
So I run the server then the client then try to login. It starts to log then logs out. The cmd shows this error.
[IMG]http://img593.imageshack.us/img593/8435/clienterror.png[/img]

item.title: Help, Client won't log in I get this error
item.dc:creator: @The_Tormented The Tormented
item.description:
@The_Tormented wrote:

did the client come with the server? some servers have a thing called a “UID” and the right client has the same “UID”, basically its a code in the server and the client that match it up. its used for server protection from ddosers, nullers, auto-talkers, cheat clients ect…

eather the source has a “UID” or the client does.

kind regards

The Tormented

Read full topic
item.source: Help, Client won't log in I get this error

item.title: Help, Client won't log in I get this error

item.description:
@matt_r_91 wrote:

Looks as if the client isn’t compatible to the sorce
